title: SET_RUNTIME_TEXTURE_PIXEL
content:
0xAB65ACEE// SetRuntimeTexturePixel
void SET_RUNTIME_TEXTURE_PIXEL(long tex, int x, int y, int r, int g, int b, int a);Parameters:tex: A handle to the runtime texture.x: The X position of the pixel to change.y: The Y position of the pixel to change.r: The new R value (0-255).g: The new G value (0-255).b: The new B value (0-255).a: The new A value (0-255).Sets a pixel in the specified runtime texture. This will have to be committed using COMMIT_RUNTIME_TEXTURE to have any effect.
codeBlocks:
// SetRuntimeTexturePixel
void SET_RUNTIME_TEXTURE_PIXEL(long tex, int x, int y, int r, int g, int b, int a);
